name: Co-Efficient
description:
Two players control Coco and Effie in various 2D levels full of fun puzzles and cooperative mechanics! Coco is able to shoot platforms to jump on while Effie switches her own gravity to run on the ceiling. Furthermore, finding Co-Efficiency Orbs allow the two to switch places with each other in order to complete their goal—meet each other with all 3 stars.

Players will play through 3 themed worlds—not including the tutorial—for a total of 23 levels. Levels consist of tricky jumps, proper chronology, and careful placement in order to complete each with all three stars: one for the minimum amount of platforms shot, one for the minimum amount of gravity inversions, and finally the third for collecting the star in the level.

This project was made over a single semester by the following as part of a school project. However, we are all very proud of our game and how it turned out! Please leave any advise or thoughts in the comments!

Zak Gellinger – Programmer

Cheng Gu – Modeler

Jono Jenkens – Programmer, UI

Lindsey Loveland – 2D Concept/Texture Artist, Modeler

Sam Peters – Designer

Zach Walk – Artist, Modeler, Rigger, Animator
